title: FIFA 2026 World Cup Qualifiers: What Sri Lankan Fans Need to Know
byline: With the 2026 FIFA World Cup fast approaching, the qualification picture is becoming clearer as nations across every continent scramble for their place at the expanded 48-team tournament. Co-hosted by the USA, Canada and Mexico, the competition will feature more teams than ever before — and as of now, 32 countries have already sealed their spots.

title: Pakistan Begin T20I Tri-Series Tonight vs Zimbabwe in Rawalpindi
byline: Hosts open week-long event as Sri Lanka await; Nissanka nears major milestone.

title: Industry warns of productivity fallout from 2026 estate wage hike
byline: The government’s latest decision to raise the plantation workers’ wages has been made without any consultations with the industry personnel, a senior representative of the plantation sector said while asserting the move could impact the output.
